articles.title: Americans finish strong with a relay world record in the swim worlds to top medal tables - AP News
articles.description: The United States, which had a frustrating swim world championships, ended on a high note Sunday with a world record in the women’s 4x100 medley in the last event of the eight-day championships. The Americans swam a record time of 3 minutes, 49.34 seconds. Th…
articles.content: SINGAPORE (AP) The United States, which had a frustrating swim world championships, ended on a high note Sunday with a world record in the womens 4x100 medley relay in the last event of the eight-day… [+4696 chars]

articles.author: Kaia  Hubbard
articles.title: Smithsonian says Trump impeachment exhibits will be restored - CBS News
articles.description: The Smithsonian said that it would update an exhibit at the National Museum of American History to reflect all impeachment proceedings in U.S. history after a placard was removed last month.
articles.content: Washington — The Smithsonian said Saturday that it would update an exhibit at the National Museum of American History to reflect all impeachment proceedings in U.S. history after a placard was remove… [+2014 chars]
